reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) SCIE 001 or (b) all of BIOL 112, BIOL 121 and one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121 and one of PHYS 100, PHYS 101, PHYS 107, PHYS 117 and one of CHEM 203, CHEM 233, CHEM 260.
If you have not completed the prerequisites, you are not eligible to register in this course. Please direct all questions to caps.301@ubc.ca. Please include your student name, number and registration release date/time in all correspondence. NO 1st OR 2nd YEAR STUDENTS ARE ELIGIBLE TO REGISTER. If you are a Year 1 or 2 student registered in the course, you will be deregistered.
If you have not completed the prerequisites, you are not eligible to register in this course. Please direct all questions to caps.301@ubc.ca. Please include your student name, number and registration release date/time in all correspondence. NO 1st OR 2nd YEAR STUDENTS ARE ELIGIBLE TO REGISTER. If you are a Year 1 or 2 student registered in the course, you will be deregistered.
If you have not completed the prerequisites, you are not eligible to register in this course. Please direct all questions to CAPS.301@ubc.ca. Please include your student name, number and registration release date/time in all correspondence.
description: Organ systems function with particular reference to mammalian and human physiology. See credit exclusion list: http://www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414
